description: This file defines a custom exception class 'EntityNotFoundException' used within the finance or banking application's exception handling module. It extends a base exception class and provides constructors to specify error messages and codes.

classes.name: EntityNotFoundException
classes.description: A custom exception indicating that a requested entity was not found in the database.

methods.name: EntityNotFoundException()
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the exception with a default error message and an error code.

methods.name: EntityNotFoundException(String message)
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the exception with a custom message and an error code.
